content:
advertisement

With the benefit of having one of the best areas in the world for glider planes in close range the Penn State Soaring Club is helping students and faculty reach new heights PERIOD

The club was founded to provide flight instruction to students and faculty at a low cost and to give them the opportunity to experience gliding at its best said Mike Robison sophomoreearth and mineral sciences soaring club president PERIOD

Club members fly glider planes which have metal bodies similar to conventional planes PERIOD But because the gliders have no engines they depend on meteorological conditions PERIOD

Gliders are towed into the atmosphere by an enginepowered plane and then released PERIOD They glide naturally on the lifts in the atmosphere from air rising off the ground and ridge PERIOD

 Robison said PERIOD

One club member expanded upon what the gliders can do PERIOD

 said Chuck Kraisinger graduateceramics a soaring club member PERIOD

The club stores and launches its three gliders at Keystone Gliderport in Julian about  miles from campus PERIOD

Many world records have been set in Julian because conditions along the Bald Eagle Ridge are ideal for gliding Robison said PERIOD Gliders from the area have been known to make it as far as the Carolinas Georgia and Tennessee PERIOD

 Kraisinger said PERIOD 

The club uses three gliders for its flights PERIOD The Blanik L13 twoperson training glider is owned by the club PERIOD Its other two oneperson Schweizer  gliders are owned by the Collegiate Soaring Association of Colorado which provides gliders to universities to promote soaring with insurance being the only cost to the club PERIOD

Training involves  to  flights with an instructor and  additional solo flights PERIOD To be licensed students must pass a Federal Aviation Administration written exam about general flight rules and a practical flying test PERIOD

Kraisinger prefers the challenge of gliders to traditional crafts PERIOD

 he said PERIOD 

As for the safety of gliding Robison said 

The soaring club gives people a chance to experience gliding for a relatively low fee PERIOD Dues are  a semester plus  for the tow into the air which is significantly cheaper than the  a new glider can cost PERIOD

 Kraisinger said
